price: 120. Сўнг шайтон унга васваса қилиб: «Эй Одам, мен сенга абадият дарахтини ва йўқ бўлмас мулку давлатни кўрсатайми?», деди.
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
